charges.charge_description: 22 D.C. Code 4504(a)(2); FIREARMS; Carrying a Pistol Without a License.(2s)

charges.charge_disposition: Defendant sentenced to Ninety Six (96) Months incarceration; Followed by Three (3) Years Supervised Release. All but Forty Eight (48) Months incarceration is suspended; The supervised release is suspended, concurrrently with count 1. Probation of Fiv e (5) Years as to count 2. Special Assessment of $200.00 imposed; Fine is waived
